{"step_by_step_thinking": "Green discoloration of teeth is not caused by tetracycline therapy, as tetracycline causes yellow-green discoloration of dentin, which is visible through the enamel and fluorescent under ultraviolet light. Fluorosis does not cause green discoloration of teeth. However, erythroblastosis fetalis can cause green discoloration of teeth due to the deposition of biliverdin.", "answer_choice": "C"}
